member.name: M:Force.DeepCloner.DeepClonerExtensions.DeepClone``1(``0)
member.summary: Performs deep (full) copy of object and related graph

member.name: M:Force.DeepCloner.DeepClonerExtensions.DeepCloneTo``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Performs deep (full) copy of object and related graph to existing object
member.remarks: Method is valid only for classes, classes should be descendants in reality, not in declaration

member.name: M:Force.DeepCloner.DeepClonerExtensions.ShallowCloneTo``2(``0,``1)
member.summary: Performs shallow copy of object to existing object
member.remarks: Method is valid only for classes, classes should be descendants in reality, not in declaration

member.name: M:Force.DeepCloner.DeepClonerExtensions.ShallowClone``1(``0)
member.summary: Performs shallow (only new object returned, without cloning of dependencies) copy of object

member.summary: This method can be used when we switch between safe / unsafe variants (for testing)

member.name: T:Force.DeepCloner.Helpers.DeepClonerSafeTypes
member.summary: Safe types are types, which can be copied without real cloning. e.g. simple structs or strings (it is immutable)

member.name: T:Force.DeepCloner.Helpers.ShallowObjectCloner
